Class WoodenStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bukkit.material.MaterialData
      • org.bukkit.material.WoodenStep
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public class WoodenStep
extends MaterialData
    Represents the different types of wooden steps.
